abstract: Op-Ed article by Oscar Arias Sanchez, former president of Costa Rica and Nobel Peace Prize recipient, warns the United States is passing up opportunities to earn its place as a world leader; urges US Senate to ratify the United Nations Arms Trade Treaty, since that will ensure the safety of all citizens as well as support a renaissance of American leadership on the world stage.
lead_paragraph: If the U.S. Senate fails to ratify the Arms Trade Treaty, America will be handcuffed by its own reluctance to lead.
